attributes.action: Stop crawley family centres cutting services
attributes.additional_details: We want to stop crawley family centres from cutting their services. This includes family sessions and classes and access to their sensory rooms. A great many of us use these on a regular basis and love them, without them the communities will feel a great loss. The babies and children will be missing out on fun and educational experiences with their parents. The parents will miss out on valuable social time with others too.
